title: The Heirloom Recipe
overview: The story tells the story of Zhao Fengpan, a dandy prince who suffers from agesia, and Cheng Biyuan, a tricky cook who runs a stinky tofu stall. The two went from quarreling enemies to sweet lovers who know each other well. In the game, the conspiracy of the court was eliminated, and a lively and delicious relationship was created.
